entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning then to 70 gusting to 90 late in the afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023
